claim: A novel is the basis for which the story for War of the Worlds was written.
premise_source_doc_sentence: H. G. Wells ' War of the Worlds , also known as Invasion and H. G. Wells ' The Worlds in War internationally , or simply as War of the Worlds , is a direct-to-DVD science fiction horror film produced by The Asylum and directed by David Michael Latt .

claim: A novel is the basis for which the story for War of the Worlds was written.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A contemporary translation of the novel set in the United States , War of the Worlds tells of a devastating invasion of Earth by technologically-advanced extraterrestrials , from the perspective of an American astronomer trying to reunite with his wife and son .

claim: A novel is the basis for which the story for War of the Worlds was written.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It is a loose adaptation of the H. G. Wells novel The War of the Worlds , and a mockbuster of the DreamWorks/Paramount film based on the same source .

claim: A novel is the basis for which the story for War of the Worlds was written.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film is loosely based on an unproduced screenplay called `` Invasion '' , written by Carlos De Los Rios in 1997 .

claim: A novel is the basis for which the story for War of the Worlds was written.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In Warhammer 40,000 , there are several core worlds spread out through the galaxy around which less important planets seem to cluster in order to survive the war against Chaos and various aliens .
